articles.title: Who is Crown Prince Frederik, the soon-to-be new King of Denmark? - CNN
articles.description: He’s been known as the Crown Prince of Denmark since the age of three, but on Sunday, he will leave Copenhagen’s Christiansborg Palace as King Frederik X, sovereign of Europe’s oldest monarchy.
